title: How is research at IIT Bombay? - Quora
tags: Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay Career Advice

response.answer_text: In IIT BOMBAY research are pretty .YOU should get well mentioned labs. BUT YOU YOU WANT TO RESEACH IN COMPUTER SCIENCE ,YOU SHOULD GO FOR IIIT HYDRABAD. IIT HAS WORLD CLASS RESEARCH FACILITIES FOR CSE AND ECE
